solution_line_template: George had ${initial_money} - ${shirt_cost} = $<<{initial_money}-{shirt_cost}={money_after_shirt}>>{money_after_shirt} left after buying a shirt.

Since he has ${money_left_after_socks} left after buying a pair of socks, then a pair of socks costs ${money_after_shirt} - ${money_left_after_socks} = $<<{money_after_shirt}-{money_left_after_socks}={socks_cost}>>{socks_cost}.
